availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander Campbell Ellis loser (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, clerk)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Blackburn Hereford Ellis in Fleming County on July 7, 1858. Step-father to Mary Hereford, Maria Hereford, Kate Hereford. Father of Sallie Ellis, Wade H. Ellis, Woodford L. Ellis. Clerk in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 5, p. 800.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 6, p. 36B.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Kenton County Marriages, Film #001943299, p. 45.
